Question: Shiftcam Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ShiftCam

Product: SnapGrip Limited Edition CES 2024

- 5 new limited edition colors designed to match the new shades of the iPhone 15 series
- Features GRIP, SNAP, CHARGE, SHOOT, DOCK, ROTATE for various shooting styles and needs
- Fan favorite features include ergonomic grip, magnetic snap, wireless charging, and mobile dock
- Loved by content creators worldwide
- Up to 50% off limited availability sale
- ShiftCam has garnered the CES Innovation Award and Reddot Design Award multiple times
- ShiftCam's LensUltra smartphone lenses promise unmatched clarity and enhanced bokeh
- LensUltra Full Kit includes 7 lenses, 3 filters, and additional accessories
- LensUltra Full Kit works with all phones and requires Camera Case or Universal Mount
- Customer reviews highlight the lens's usability, image quality, and shallow depth of field
- FAQ, product registration, warranty, returns, and privacy information available on the website
Summary_cn:
ShiftCam

产品：SnapGrip限量版CES 2024

- 5种新的限量版颜色，与iPhone 15系列的新色调相匹配
- 具有GRIP，SNAP，CHARGE，SHOOT，DOCK，ROTATE等功能，适用于各种拍摄风格和需求
- 粉丝最喜欢的功能包括符合人体工程学的握把、磁性快拍、无线充电和移动底座
- 被全球内容创作者所喜爱
- 享受低至50%的限量供应销售折扣
- ShiftCam多次获得CES创新奖和Reddot设计奖
- ShiftCam的LensUltra智能手机镜头承诺提供无与伦比的清晰度和增强的背景虚化效果
- LensUltra全套装包括7个镜头、3个滤镜和其他附件
- LensUltra全套装适用于所有手机，需要相机壳或通用支架
- 客户评论强调了镜头的易用性、图像质量和浅景深效果
- 网站提供常见问题解答、产品注册、保修、退货和隐私信息
